title: r/Maliciouscompliance How I Got Revenge Against My Evil Teacher
description:
r/Maliciouscompliance In today's episode, OP has an incredibly obnoxious teacher who thinks that her word is the absolute law. And to make things worse, the teacher is a complete hypocrite who thinks that the rules don't apply to her. The teacher thinks that she can crush OP's spirit, but OP gets sugary-sweet revenge in the nicest way possible: with malicious compliance! If you like this podcast and want to see more, follow my podcast for more daily Reddit content!
